section.p: Indication of whether the patient is pregnant

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11474 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.79"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11192)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10418)/@code="67471-3" Pregnancy (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10419)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10420), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pregnancy 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.42 DYNAMIC (CONF:10421)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.18
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11192)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10418)/@code="67471-3" Pregnancy (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10419)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:10420), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Pregnancy 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.42 DYNAMIC (CONF:10421)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.18

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.79"/> <code code="67471-3" displayName="Pregnancy"/> <value xsi:type="CD"/> </observation>
